attributes.action: Give LGBTQ The Exact Same Rights As Heterosexuals!
attributes.additional_details: This petition states that instead of have a single petition fighting for one right, why not fight for all at once! Adoption, Marriage, Giving Blood, Stopping government from 'outing' gay cabinet members etc... If you agree that LGBTQ people(s) should have EXACTLY the same rights as Hetrosexuals then please sign!
